text: The Syro-Malankara Catholic Eparchy of Gurgaon was established by Pope Francis on 26 March 2015. This diocese has a huge territory in north India, including 22 of the 29 states of India. At the southern boundary of the diocese are the states of Gujarat, Madhya Pradesh, Chhattisgarh and Orissa. The bishop's residence and chancery is at the Mar Ivanios Bhavan in Neb Sarai. ==References== Category:Syro-Malankara Catholic dioceses Category:Eastern Catholic dioceses in India Category:Dioceses established in the 21st century Category:Christian organizations established in 2015 Category:2015 establishments in India
title: Syro-Malankara Catholic Eparchy of Gurgaon
